problem_text_cn: 如图,市政府准备修建一座高AB=6m的过街天桥,已知天桥的坡比为3:4,则坡面AC的长度为()m．
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the city government plans to build a overpass with height AB = N_0 . Given that the slope ratio of the overpass is N_1:N_2, the length of the slope AC is ().
raw_answer: 解:∵天桥的坡比=AB:BC=3:4,AB=6∴BC=8,在直角三角形ABC中,AC=√{AB²{+BC}²}=10m故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查了解直角三角形的应用,理解坡度的定义是解决本题的关键．
